title: Israelgogo
author: Israelgogo
created_time: May 21, 2022, 05:18:59 AMLast edit: May 21, 2022, 05:43:07 AM by Israelgogo
content: Waking up to see a new day gives you an opportunity to re-write your story,yesterday is gone ,today comes with another chance to do better and proof yourself,one might be feeling reluctant due to failure from several attempts ,yesterday is gone ,today is giving you a fresh start to do more and be better at it,so many succesful men you see today has a story to tell but there stories were changed because they never gave up ,everyday gave them an opportunity to re-write their story and they got better at it.
